HeroSection.tagline: YOUR JOURNEY TO WELLNESS STARTS HERE
HeroSection.headline: Find Your Perfect Mental Health Professional
HeroSection.description: Take the first step towards better mental health. Our platform connects you with qualified professionals who understand your unique journey and provide the support you need, when you need it most.

ValueSection.title: Heal Your Inner Child
ValueSection.subtitle: Find peace and well-being through personalized care.
ValueSection.description: Overspending on benefits programs with a web of providers? Struggling to boost team productivity and measure ROI? You've come to the right place. Our {integratedPlatform} is a one-stop care hub that centralizes our programs in a single application, providing access to services 24/7/365.

HowItWorksSection.title: How It Works
HowItWorksSection.subtitle: Your journey to better health and wellness in four simple steps

ServiceSection.title: Our Integrated Health Platform™
ServiceSection.subtitle: Multiple health and wellness programs to support your organization.
ServiceSection.subtitleLine2: They work great on their own, but are even stronger together.

eap.appointmentConfirmed: Perfect! Your virtual appointment today at 8:45 AM is confirmed.
eap.noCarePlans: You don't have any care plans yet

mentalHealth.therapistReady: Dr. Sarah Johnson is ready for your scheduled therapy session.

primaryCare.doctorReady: Dr. Michael Chen is ready to discuss your health concerns and medical questions.

wellness.trackActivities: Track nutrition, fitness, and mindfulness activities.

ProfessionalHero.headline: Focus on What You Do Best: Helping People
ProfessionalHero.description: Join our platform and let us handle the administrative work. Connect with clients who match your expertise, optimize your practice, and grow your impact.

MatchingSystem.title: Find Clients Who Are Right for You
MatchingSystem.subtitle: Save time and energy with our intelligent matching system. Focus on the clinical aspects of your practice while we connect you with clients who align perfectly with your expertise and preferences.
MatchingSystem.issueTypeDesc: Match with clients based on the specific mental health challenges you specialize in treating
MatchingSystem.therapeuticApproachDesc: Connect with clients who prefer your therapeutic methods and techniques
MatchingSystem.ageCategoryDesc: Work with the age groups you're most experienced and comfortable with
MatchingSystem.expertiseDesc: Leverage your unique competencies to help those who need them most
MatchingSystem.benefitDesc: Our precision matching means you spend less time on administrative tasks and more time doing what you love—providing quality mental health care. Every client connection is tailored to your professional strengths and preferences.

PlatformBenefits.title: Platform Benefits for Professionals
PlatformBenefits.subtitle: We provide comprehensive support so you can focus on what matters most—delivering exceptional mental health care to your clients.
PlatformBenefits.simpleManagementDesc: Provide us with your available time slots, meet your clients, and we handle the rest—scheduling, billing, and administrative tasks.
PlatformBenefits.stabilizePracticeDesc: Maintain a consistent client base and steady revenue stream. Focus on growth without worrying about fluctuating income.
PlatformBenefits.optimizeTimeDesc: Concentrate on clinical aspects of your practice and free up time for your personal life. We handle the business side.
PlatformBenefits.practiceToolsDesc: Access OWL Practice-style features including record keeping, scheduling, billing, and payroll management—all in one place.
PlatformBenefits.virtualLibraryDesc: Unlimited access to PDF books, research articles, psychological tests, and test correction platforms when needed.
PlatformBenefits.contentDevelopmentDesc: Get help creating podcasts, videos, and articles to expand your reach and generate additional revenue streams.
PlatformBenefits.professionalDevDesc: Free training programs and receive a note-taking tablet after completing a certain number of sessions.
PlatformBenefits.startupKitDesc: New psychologists receive comprehensive startup assistance and mentorship from experienced professionals.
PlatformBenefits.supervisionDesc: Get access to professional supervision when you need it, included in your membership at no extra cost.
PlatformBenefits.communityDesc: Join support groups for mutual aid, reflection, clinical discussions, and professional community building.
PlatformBenefits.psychiatryDesc: Access discussions with psychiatrists through our partnership with Averroes for comprehensive patient care.
PlatformBenefits.financialDesc: Preferential rates with accountants, OPQ membership fee support based on sessions, and investment fund opportunities.
PlatformBenefits.perk1: Become a shareholder and collectively benefit from our success
PlatformBenefits.perk2: Social mission: Priority support for clients in remote regions
PlatformBenefits.perk3: Reduced rates for family/child cases with joint platform support
PlatformBenefits.perk4: $1 per session contribution to an investment fund

ProfessionalCTA.title: Join Our Community Today
ProfessionalCTA.description: Take the next step in your professional journey. Join thousands of mental health professionals who have transformed their practice with our platform.
ProfessionalCTA.helpText: Have questions? Our team is here to help you every step of the way.

ClientHero.tagline: YOUR JOURNEY TO WELLNESS STARTS HERE
ClientHero.headline: Find the Right Mental Health Support, Fast
ClientHero.description: Connect with qualified professionals who understand your needs, no matter where you are. Begin your journey to better mental health today.

QuickAccess.title: Get the Support You Need, When You Need It
QuickAccess.subtitle: We make mental health care accessible, convenient, and personalized to your unique situation.
QuickAccess.findHelpDesc: No more endless waiting lists. Connect with qualified mental health professionals who are available to help you now.
QuickAccess.accessAnywhereDesc: Whether you're in a remote region or a major city, find the right professional who matches your needs, no matter the distance.
QuickAccess.startJourneyDesc: Begin with educational resources, self-learning materials, and readings while you prepare for your first session with a professional.
QuickAccess.highlightDesc: Every journey begins with a single step. Whether you're seeking immediate support or wanting to learn more about mental wellness, we're here to guide you every step of the way.

Resources.title: Take Charge of Your Mental Wellness
Resources.subtitle: Increase your knowledge, practice self-care, and prepare for your journey with our comprehensive educational resources.
Resources.educationalArticlesDesc: Access a comprehensive library of articles about mental health, self-care strategies, and wellness tips.
Resources.videoGuidesDesc: Watch educational videos on managing stress, anxiety, and building healthy habits to prepare for your journey.
Resources.selfAssessmentDesc: Use our guided questionnaires to better understand your needs and communicate effectively with professionals.
Resources.guidedMeditationsDesc: Begin your self-care practice with free guided meditation and mindfulness exercises.
Resources.premiumDesc: Unlock premium resources including personalized learning paths, advanced self-care techniques, exclusive workshops, and one-on-one guidance to accelerate your mental wellness journey.
Resources.benefitsNote: Start with free resources to build your foundation, then explore premium options when you're ready to deepen your practice and accelerate your growth.

ExploreTopics.title: Explore a topic
ExploreTopics.subtitle: Access extensive free content on various mental health topics. Explore our educational resources to better understand your situation and find the right support for your needs.

ClientCTA.title: Take the First Step Today
ClientCTA.description: Your mental wellness journey starts with a single decision. Connect with a professional who truly understands your needs.
ClientCTA.helpText: Questions? Our support team is available to help you find the right path forward.

analytics.title: Analytics coming soon.
analytics.description: We're finalizing an analytics space to track your key metrics: engagement rate, client retention, clinical progress, and marketplace resource performance. Our team is actively working on setting up dashboards and custom exports.
analytics.phaseDescription: Data collection is ready and we're finishing the visualization interfaces. You'll gradually see the first reports appear as we iterate on the product.
analytics.specificNeedsDesc: Tell us which metrics you'd like us to prioritize and we'll integrate them into the roadmap.
analytics.thankYou: Thank you for your patience — this feature will be activated when the full platform launches. We'll notify you via email and in the dashboard.

library.title: Share and discover the best of your expertise.
library.description: Upload your videos, books, guides or webinars to support the professional community. Get inspired by your colleagues' creations, collaborate and make your practice shine.
library.searchPlaceholder: Search for a resource, author or topic...
library.noResults: No resources match your search at the moment. Try broadening your filters or be the first to share content!

hero.headline: At Je chemine, we believe that everyone deserves human, safe, and personalized support tailored to their reality.
hero.description1: Our mission is to support your emotional and psychological well-being through a personalized journey designed to meet your unique needs and pace. We offer simple and caring access to a team of experts whose practice is regulated, recognized, and compliant with their professional order requirements.
hero.description2: Whatever your situation, you are accompanied by a qualified professional, ready to walk with you towards a more serene, balanced, and fulfilling life.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description1: With Je chemine, you are no longer alone. We are here to support you, guide you, and help you journey towards a more serene, balanced, and fulfilling life.
commitment.description2: Our platform offers a simple, human, and secure gateway to take care of your mental health – for you or your family – while giving you access to relevant tools, clear information, and reliable professional support.

expertise.title: Ethics, rigor, and confidentiality at the heart of every interaction.
expertise.description1: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information in accordance with current regulations, including Bill 25. Every intervention is based on rigorous standards and deep respect for your dignity.
expertise.description2: Whether you consult a psychologist, psychotherapist, or other professional, you have the certainty of being accompanied by a qualified expert, recognized by their professional order.

confidentiality.title: Respect for Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: Strict protection of your sensitive information and respect for ethical standards.

quality.title: Professional Quality
quality.description: Regulated practices, rigorous supervision, and continuous training for each practitioner.

personalizedJourney.title: Your journey is unique, your support is too.
personalizedJourney.description: Our matching process aims to connect you with the professional who best suits your reality. Each meeting is designed to facilitate lasting engagement and promote the success of your therapeutic journey.
personalizedJourney.goal: The goal: build a strong therapeutic relationship adapted to your needs.

accessibility.title: A platform designed to adapt to your daily life.
accessibility.description: We know your reality is unique. Je chemine makes help accessible according to your preferences, so you can move forward at your own pace, wherever you are.

remote.title: Remote Consultations
remote.description: Secure video calls to support you, whether you're at home, traveling, or in a remote area.
remote.details: No more geographical barriers, no more logistical obstacles.

office.title: Office Consultations
office.description: A warm and professional welcome for those who prefer direct human contact.
office.details: Spaces designed for your comfort, confidentiality, and well-being.

choice.title: Professional Choice
choice.description: You remain in control: find the specialist who suits you and build a solid therapeutic relationship.
choice.details: Our platform offers you transparent profiles and support to make the right choice.

hero.headline: A complete ecosystem of mental health services for adults, children, families, and schools.
hero.description: We bring together qualified professionals and specialized programs to support each person at every stage of their journey. Discover how we can support you and your family.

foundations.title: Our Foundations
items: A simple and reassuring platform to track your journey.

therapySpectrum.title: Services dedicated to adults, children, couples, and families.

adult.title: Adult Psychotherapy
adult.description: Support for depression, anxiety, post-traumatic stress, obsessive-compulsive disorders, panic disorder, ADHD (assessment & follow-up), emotional management, self-esteem, relationship challenges, and life transition adaptation.

child.title: Child & Adolescent Psychotherapy
child.description: Targeted interventions for learning difficulties, behavioral disorders, ADHD, anxiety, oppositional defiant disorder, emotional management, social relationships, and self-esteem.

family.title: Family Therapy
family.description: Understanding dynamics, restoring communication, and building a more harmonious climate to move forward together.

couple.title: Couple Therapy
couple.description: Navigate conflicts, strengthen connection, communicate better, and build a respectful and stable relationship.

parenting.title: Parental Coaching
parenting.description: Support to better understand your child's development, manage behavioral challenges, emotions, positive guidance, and continuity between school and home.

sentiersProgram.title: A space dedicated to children, adolescents, families, and schools.
sentiersProgram.description: The Sentiers program offers comprehensive support that combines clinical expertise, educational tools, and close collaboration with the school environment.

assessment.title: Complete School Assessment
assessment.description: Tests, observations, and analyses to understand the learning profile and specific needs.

iep.title: Intervention Plans (IEP)
iep.description: Collaborative design of individualized plans with clear and measurable objectives.

collaboration.title: Clinical Analysis & School-Family Collaboration
collaboration.description: An interdisciplinary team working with teachers, administrators, and parents.

support.title: Individualized Support
support.description: Psychosocial follow-up, parental coaching, ADHD/anxiety/learning guidance, classroom interventions.

sentiersProgram.customSupport: Tailored support to promote success, self-esteem, and well-being for young people, in partnership with their school and family environment.
sentiersProgram.networkDescription: School teams, practitioners, family: we work together to implement the best strategies.

complementaryServices.title: Resources to go further, at your own pace.

adhd.title: ADHD Assessment (adult & child)
adhd.description: Complete process with recommendations, follow-ups, interventions, and adaptation strategies for school, home, and work.

selfLearning.title: Self-Learning & Educational Resources
selfLearning.description: Free access to tools to start your journey: psychoeducation, breathing exercises, guided meditations, issue understanding sheets.

paidContent.title: Specialized Paid Content
paidContent.description: Thematic programs, specialized videos, workshops, content created by our professionals, podcasts, articles, and capsules to deepen your learning.

modelWorks.title: Why Our Model Works
modelWorks.description: Whether you're taking the first step or continuing an already started follow-up, Je chemine offers you a reliable space to move forward.
reasons: A simple, reassuring, and secure platform

hero.headline: An approach built around you, by experts who listen and adapt to your reality.
hero.description: Every support is unique. We combine a deeply human approach with recognized clinical practices to build a tailored journey, respectful of your story, goals, and pace.

respect.title: Respect for the Person
respect.description: You are at the heart of the process, never in an imposed model.

rigor.title: Clinical Rigor
rigor.description: Validated approaches, regulated and continuously updated.

trust.title: Trust and Safety
trust.description: An ethical, confidential, and reassuring framework to move forward.

personCentered.title: We adapt our support to your needs, not the other way around.
personCentered.description: Every individual has a story, a pace, a sensitivity. Building a tailored therapeutic journey means allowing your voice to be heard, your preferences to be respected, and your pace to be followed, without a prefabricated model.
personCentered.note: Inspired by our personalized journey concept: a unique approach, continuous adjustments, evolving support.

objectives.title: Your Objectives
objectives.description: Clarify what you want to transform, improve, or consolidate to guide each session.

issue.title: Your Issue
issue.description: We finely analyze your challenges to propose interventions aligned with your reality.

style.title: Your Relational Style
style.description: We adapt our presence, pace, and language to your way of relating.

preferences.title: Your Therapeutic Preferences
preferences.description: We adjust methods, tools, and meeting structure so you feel recognized and respected at every stage.

clinicalApproaches.title: Validated clinical models, carried by recognized experts.
clinicalApproaches.description: Our professionals practice according to scientifically recognized approaches regulated by their professional orders. Each method is specifically chosen for your situation.

cbt.title: Cognitive-Behavioral Therapies (CBT)
cbt.description: Proven tools to act on thoughts, behaviors, and emotions that hold you back.

psychodynamic.title: Psychodynamic Approaches
psychodynamic.description: Understand your deep dynamics and relational patterns for lasting transformation.

systemic.title: Systemic Approaches
systemic.description: Family, couple, groups: intervene on interactions to restore collective balance.

humanistic.title: Humanistic Approaches
humanistic.description: An authentic, empathetic, and non-judgmental presence to promote your autonomy.

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness / Mindful Awareness
mindfulness.description: Strengthen attention, emotional regulation, and connection to self through guided practices.

psychoeducation.title: Psychoeducation
psychoeducation.description: Structured support to understand, equip yourself, and implement adapted strategies.

neuropsych.title: School and Neuropsychological Interventions
neuropsych.description: Assessments, intervention plans, and specialized follow-ups to support educational success.

coaching.title: Parental Coaching & Specialized Guidance
coaching.description: Concrete support for ADHD, anxiety, emotional management, oppositional behaviors, etc.

ethics.title: We protect your trust, at every moment.
ethics.description: Confidentiality is not an option, it's our foundation. We designed our platform and processes to ensure maximum protection of your privacy, from the first contact to the closure of your file.
ethics.note: Each professional is a signatory to specific commitments regarding data protection and benefits from ongoing training on confidentiality.

ethics.title: Respect for Ethical Rules
ethics.description: Our practitioners respect the ethical codes of their professional orders and ensure the protection of your dignity.

law25.title: Compliance with Bill 25
law25.description: We apply strict policies for the protection of your personal and sensitive data.

security.title: Secure Information Management
security.description: Robust technological systems and rigorous internal processes to guarantee confidentiality.

confidentiality.title: Absolute Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: Your journey is protected: exchanges, documents, and follow-ups are strictly confidential.

flexibility.badge: 4 · Flexibility: Where and When You Want
flexibility.title: Choose the support mode that fits your reality.

online.title: Online Consultations
bullets: Secure, encrypted video calls, simple to join
No travel required, ideal for busy schedules
Accessible everywhere, even in remote areas

office.title: In-Office Consultations
bullets: In-person meetings in a warm setting
For those who prefer direct contact
Spaces designed for confidentiality and comfort

extras.description: We adjust planning and logistics according to your needs to offer you a smooth and reassuring experience.

matching.title: The right professional, for the right person, at the right time.
matching.description: Our matching process saves time and provides high-quality support. You are connected to a professional who matches your clinical needs, relationship expectations, and daily reality.
matching.highlight: A major strength of Je chemine

steps.title: In-depth Analysis of Your Request
steps.description: We gather key information about your issue, goals, and context.

steps.title: Identification of Matching Criteria
steps.description: Desired approach, age, desired clinical experience, personal preferences: we specify each parameter.

steps.title: Selection of the Ideal Professional
steps.description: Our platform identifies the person who has the expertise, style, and availability suited to your situation.

steps.title: Continuous Monitoring and Adjustments
steps.description: We remain present to ensure the quality of support and adjust if necessary.

hero.headline: We are here to support you.
hero.description: Whether you're starting a journey, seeking information, or want to be guided to the right professional, our team is available for you. Every request is handled with respect, confidentiality, and care.

expectations.title: What You Can Expect
items: Attentive listening and a personalized response.

channels.title: An email is enough to start the conversation.

services.title: Services and Approaches
services.description: Understand our services, clinical approaches, and available modalities.

matching.title: Matching with a Professional
matching.description: Identify the person best suited to your issue and preferences.

sentiers.title: Sentiers Program
sentiers.description: Get information about support dedicated to children, adolescents, and schools.

support.title: Profile, Billing, and Support
support.description: Create or update your profile, receive administrative help or clarification on billing.

channels.responseTime: We respond to every message promptly and schedule, when needed, an exploratory call to clarify your expectations.

form.title: Do you prefer to write to us differently? Fill out our form.
form.description: Share your needs, questions, and availability. A manager will contact you as soon as possible to ensure personalized follow-up.
reasons: Request an appointment or schedule a first meeting.
Get detailed information about our approaches and services.
Clarify your needs, objectives, and the context of your journey.
Receive help to prepare for your first appointment.
form.guidance: We will guide you to the right professional and help you prepare well for your first meeting.

emergency.title: In Case of Emergency
emergency.description: If you are experiencing an emergency situation, go immediately to the nearest medical center or contact your region's emergency services.
emergency.callToAction: Call 911 or your local emergency service

joinUs.title: You are a professional in mental health? Join our mission.
joinUs.description: Become part of a collaborative platform dedicated to quality care, supported practice, and meaningful client relationships. Together, let's build a more human, accessible, and professional mental health ecosystem.

matching.title: Intelligent Matching
matching.description: Meet clients who match your expertise and intervention style.

support.title: Administrative Support
support.description: Planning, billing, and follow-up: focus on clinical work, we handle the rest.

tools.title: Practice Tools & Mentorship
tools.description: Access to management tools, mentorship, supervision, and the Je Diversifie program.

flexibility.title: Flexible Model
flexibility.description: Work according to your availability, online or in office, with constant team support.

support.title: Have a question about a service, a consultation, or your profile?
support.description: Our team provides personalized support to guide you through every step of your journey and resolve any doubts or questions.

services.title: Understanding Services
services.description: We help you explore your issue, clarify your needs, and identify appropriate resources.

consultations.title: How Consultations Work
consultations.description: Detailed explanations about online or in-office meetings, planning, and follow-ups.

billing.title: Billing and Payments
billing.description: Administrative support for receipts, insurance, payment plans, and reimbursements.

support.contactPrompt: Use our contact form or write to us directly. We respond quickly and guide you with clarity.

hero.headline: Choosing Je chemine means choosing a human, professional, and structured approach to take care of your mental health.
hero.description: Our platform was designed to eliminate obstacles, simplify access to help, and support you at every stage of your journey. We move forward with you, at your pace, so that every interaction is smooth, reassuring, and deeply human.
hero.subtitle: An experience built on trust and care

reasons.title: A human, professional, and structured approach to take care of your mental health.
reasons.description: We eliminate obstacles, simplify access, and support you at every stage. Discover what makes Je chemine unique.

personalized.title: A Truly Personalized Journey
personalized.description: Your story, challenges, and goals are unique. Our intelligent matching identifies the professional best suited to your reality to build an authentic and motivating therapeutic relationship. You journey with someone who truly fits you.

qualified.title: Qualified and Supervised Professionals
qualified.description: Psychologists, psychotherapists, psychoeducators, and other specialists: you are supported by experts whose practice is recognized and rigorously regulated by their professional order.

ethics.title: A Strong Commitment to Ethics and Confidentiality
ethics.description: Your trust is essential. We apply high privacy protection standards, including Bill 25, to guarantee a safe and respectful space. Your information is protected. Your journey is respected. Your space is secure.

access.badge: Accessible wherever you are, when you need it
access.title: You choose the modality that suits you, we ensure the quality of the experience.
access.description: We eliminate barriers that prevent consultation and simplify your journey through a platform designed for you. You choose the option that suits you best, we support you with the same quality of care.

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: Access professional support via secure video calls, no matter where you are — at home, at work, traveling, or in a remote area.
remote.highlight: Total flexibility and continuity of follow-ups.

office.title: In Office
office.description: Enjoy a warm and professional environment for direct contact, if you prefer an in-person approach.
office.highlight: A welcoming, confidential, and serene space.

platform.badge: A simple, human platform designed for you
platform.title: Your journey is smooth, reassuring, and continuously supported.

navigation.title: Intuitive Navigation
navigation.description: A clear interface that simplifies every action and guides you effortlessly.

access.title: Quick Access
access.description: Immediately find relevant services and adapt your journey to your needs.

support.title: Continuous Support
support.description: Our team is available to support you, answer your questions, and reassure you.

familySupport.title: Whatever your challenge, we have a professional to help you.
familySupport.description: Adult psychotherapy, family therapy, school assessment, ADHD support, parental support, or psychoeducation: every member of your family can find their place and receive the necessary help.
familySupport.coordinated: A coordinated approach for the whole family.

adult.title: Adult Psychotherapy
adult.description: Individualized support to navigate your personal and emotional challenges.

family.title: Family Therapy
family.description: Dialogue spaces to strengthen bonds, ease tensions, and move forward together.

assessment.title: School and ADHD Assessment
assessment.description: Complete assessments and action plans adapted to each child's specific needs.

parenting.title: Parental Support and Psychoeducation
parenting.description: Concrete tools to support your child's development and your role as a parent.

supportCommitment.badge: A Commitment to Support You Every Step of the Way
supportCommitment.title: We accompany you from the first contact to the completion of your journey.
supportCommitment.description: From the moment you write to us to your last session, we ensure your experience is smooth, human, and supported. You are never alone.

contact.title: Initial Contact
contact.description: Our team responds quickly and personally to understand your needs and guide you towards the best solution.

matching.title: Professional Matching
matching.description: We connect you with a professional who matches your reality, your preferences, and your objectives.

followUp.title: Follow-up and Adjustment
followUp.description: Throughout your journey, we remain available to adjust, answer your questions, and ensure your well-being.

supportCommitment.goal: Our goal: that every person feels heard, supported, and accompanied at every stage.

overview.welcomeMessage: Je Chemine is here to support you, step by step. Everything is designed to make your journey human, caring, and aligned with your needs.
overview.quote: You're already moving forward. Continue at your own pace, we're with you.
overview.todayMissionText: Take a moment to breathe deeply, note your state of mind, and explore a self-care tool below.

requestStatus.title: Request Status
requestStatus.subtitle: We're analyzing your profile to identify the best suited professional.
requestStatus.takenCareBy: Matching handled by Je Chemine team
requestStatus.nextStepText: Confirmation of your professional and appointment proposal

support.title: Support & Help
support.emailDesc: Write to us for any question or adjustment.
support.faqDesc: Find answers to frequently asked questions.

benefits.benefit3: Access to wellness resources and self-care tools
benefits.benefit4: Flexible scheduling that fits your life

matching.title: Professional Matching
